article: 5 Quick Steps to Delete an App on Samsung TV's Smart Hub
intro: If your Samsung Smart TV is slowing down, you can delete unused apps to free up some space. Keep in mind that you can't remove preinstalled apps. Here's how to remove and delete an app on a Samsung TV.
